name: Investigator Ivy
description:
This is the first game made for my first 48 hour Game Jam at my college. 

You play as the renowned investigator, "Investigator Ivy" and use his power to hide in plain sight. Use any of his gadgets that you find along the way to get to the big boss of the operation!

This is a closed project, the final update has been released. I would have loved to work more on this project but it just didn't seem fruitful. Maybe one day I will revisit it but for now I set my sights on greener fields!

Any feedback is highly appreciated, whether it be positive or negative!!
